overview:
“Peter Madams is responsible for the company’s platform and technology direction as ClairMail’s Chief Technology Officer. Previously, Peter held management positions leading the technical direction at Chordiant Software, Zadu, PictureTalk and nCUBE.

Throughout Peter’s 25-year career in technology, he has been a successful innovator of many unique business applications in banking, trading systems, media and communications. Peter holds a master’s degree in computer science from Manchester University, England where he graduated first class with honors and completed the International Executive program at Columbia University.” (Source: ClairMail)
